text: Thirty days prior to each issue date, the Department of Human Services shall furnish to the Office of Consumer Protection a list of the 100 most commonly used prescription drugs.
historical:

1981 Ed., § 33-711.

1973 Ed., § 33-811.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-805.51.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-114, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-804.51

DC CODE § 48-801.01

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: List of most commonly used prescription drugs.
